text: David Ayer (born January 18, 1968) is an American filmmaker. He is known for writing the screenplays of Training Day (2001), The Fast and the Furious (2001), and S.W.A.T. (2003). In 2016, he directed the superhero movie Suicide Squad from the DC Extended Universe. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Illinois Category:Movie producers from Illinois Category:Screenwriters from Illinois Category:Movie producers from Maryland Category:Movie directors from Maryland Category:Screenwriters from Maryland Category:Writers from Minnesota Category:People from Bethesda, Maryland Category:People from Champaign, Illinois
title: David Ayer
